title: Error happens after installing extensions in vscode

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### My guess as to where the error originates ```Rust use std::str::Chars; pub trait ConsumeIf { fn consume_if( &mut self, check: &T ) -> Option<()>; } impl ConsumeIf for Chars<'_> { fn consume_if( &mut self, check: &char ) -> Option<()> { if let Some(item) = self.clone().next() {//Cloning this iterator maybe caused the issue? return if item == *check { self.next(); Some(()) } else { None } } None } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0 (88f19c6da 2021-05-03) binary: rustc commit-hash: 88f19c6dab716c6281af7602e30f413e809c5974 commit-date: 2021-05-03 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.52.0 LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic #0 [predicates_of] computing predicates of `std::clone::Clone` #1 [param_env] computing normalized predicates of `std::clone::Clone` #2 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate ```
Backtrace

``` 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/88f19c6dab716c6281af7602e30f413e809c5974/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/88f19c6dab716c6281af7602e30f413e809c5974/library/std/src/panicking.rs:435:5 2: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::incremental_verify_ich 3: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory 4: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 5: ::predicates_of 6: rustc_ty_utils::ty::param_env 7: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 8: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory 9: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 10: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 11: ::param_env 12: ::check_expr 13: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 14: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_block 15: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 16: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_arm 17: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 18: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_block 19: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 20: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_body 21: as rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor>::visit_fn 22: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_impl_item 23: rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor::visit_nested_impl_item 24: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_item 25: rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor::visit_nested_item 26: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_item 27: rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor::visit_nested_item 28: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_item 29: rustc_hir::intravisit::Visitor::visit_nested_item 30: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_crate 31: rustc_lint::late::late_lint_crate 32: rustc_data_structures::sync::join 33: as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once 34: rustc_session::utils::::time 35: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 36: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 37: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 38: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 39: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 40: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 41: ::analysis 42: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 43: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 44: rustc_span::with_source_map 45: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 46: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```

This error happened after i install some extensions in vscode some of which i do not know. I can recall installing the RLS extension.
